name: Supaboard
tagline: Ask in plain English. Get accurate answers from your data
description: Ask questions in plain English. Get accurate, actionable answers from all your business data, no SQL, no waiting. Supaboard connects to 600+ data sources and gives your team the power to analyze, decide, and act instantly. Our built-in agents apply your business logic, so the answers you get are not just smart, but right. Fully governed. No data leaks. No technical skills required. Business intelligence, finally for everyone.

name: The new v0
tagline: Full stack vibe coding platform. Created by Vercel.
description: Your collaborative AI assistant to design, iterate, and scale full-stack applications for the web.

name: Higgsfield Vibe-Motion
tagline: Create motion images in a single prompt in an editing canvas
description: Create stunning AI-generated videos with Vibe Motion on Higgsfield. Transform your ideas into professional videos using advanced AI models with intuitive creative controls.

name: Voxtral Transcribe 2 by Mistral
tagline: Real-time speech-to-text with speaker diarization
description: Voxtral Transcribe 2 delivers ultra-fast, highly accurate speech-to-text with real-time transcription and speaker diarization. Built for live apps, voice agents, and meetings, it supports 13 languages, word-level timestamps, and privacy-first deployment All at industry-leading speed and cost.

name: Webflow AI site builder
tagline: Turn a prompt into a production-ready site with Webflow
description: Turn a simple prompt into a multi-page, production-ready website with Webflow‚Äôs AI site builder. Start with structure, styles, and animations, then continue building seamlessly in Webflow. It‚Äôs a faster start on a foundation built to scale.

name: GitHub Agent HQ
tagline: Run Claude, Codex & Copilot directly in GitHub & VS Code
description: Claude by Anthropic and OpenAI Codex are now available in public preview on GitHub and VS Code with a Copilot Pro+ or Copilot Enterprise subscription.

name: Kling 3.0
tagline: Native 4K output with extended video time with just a prompt
description: An all-in-one creative engine that enables truly native multimodal creation

name: Miro MCP
tagline: Turn code into visual docs, board context into code
description: Your AI coding assistant can now read your Miro boards. ‚Ä¢ Code ‚Üí Visual Docs: Open your AI tool in your repo, ask "Document this on Miro" - get architecture diagrams, flowcharts, data models. ‚Ä¢ Board Context ‚Üí Code: AI reads your PRDs, specs, diagrams, flows, prototypes, decisions and generates code matching your plans. ‚Ä¢ Works with: Cursor, Claude Code, Windsurf, VSCode + Copilot, Replit. ‚Ä¢ 2-min setup, OAuth. Public beta.

name: Sylvian AI Forms
tagline: Never fill a PDF by hand again
description: Upload a reimbursement form and 10 receipt images ‚Äî Sylvian will fill in your form with all the info. Upload a compliance form and a spreadsheet with 10 rows of information ‚Äî Sylvian will fill out 10 compliance forms for you. All of this in seconds. Sylvian AI Forms is the most complete PDF Form AI ever, made so you never have to fill a PDF by hand again.

name: TalkToPost
tagline: Voice notes to LinkedIn and X viral content in seconds!
description: Turn messy voice notes into viral LinkedIn and X carousels in seconds. It understands your idea and generate professional social content instantly, eliminating manual typing and design work. No typing, no Canva or Figma

name: AutoBandStudio
tagline: AI that turns your melody into a full arrangement
description: Free Windows app that turns your melody into full arrangement with AI. Unlike tools generating songs from prompts, AutoBandStudio keeps your voice. You sketch the melody ‚Äî AI fills in the rest. How it works: 1. Draw melody on piano roll 2. AI generates chords, drums, bass, guitar 3. Export as MIDI or audio Features: üéπ AI chord prediction üé∏ Guitar generation (4 styles) ü•Å Editable drums ‚úÇÔ∏è Regenerate sections üíæ Save/load projects Free ‚Äî Pro unlocks unlimited exports.

name: Therapist AI
tagline: Built by Therapists, For Therapists
description: Get help from a team of AI therapy assistants and digital tools to manage therapy sessions, track client progress, and streamline administrative tasks. Avoid losing your most valuable resource - time. With Therapist AI, you'll find everything in one place 24/7. For professionals, you can focus more on care and less on paperwork.

name: Votap
tagline: A platform for the world to vote on political leaders
description: Votap is like Google Reviews, but for politicians. Tap to upvote or downvote‚Äîand see thousands of votes move the chart live.

name: Agent Sandbox
tagline: Your agent's personal remote computer and drive
description: Agent Sandbox gives AI agents what they've been missing: a real computer. While other tools focus on making AI smarter, we focus on making AI capable, with sandboxed compute, cloud storage, and artifact retrieval in a single tool. Agents can now upload files, run Python/Bash, install packages, and return real deliverables like charts, PDFs, and datasets all while running locally on your machine.

name: PopAir
tagline: Your All-in-one AI Copilot for MacOS
description: PopAir is the native macOS AI powerhouse built for speed and seamless integration. Using SwiftUI for 5x less RAM, it brings the world‚Äôs best models into one experience. ‚Ä¢ Unified Hub: GPT, Claude, Gemini & DeepSeek in one place. ‚Ä¢ Image Studio: Generate, edit, and upscale instantly. ‚Ä¢ Smart Meetings: One-click recording, transcription, and AI summaries. ‚Ä¢ System-wide: Instant OCR, translation, and rewriting via the Magic Panel (‚å•‚å•). One subscription. The AI superpower your Mac.

name: Modaal
tagline: Business-grade iOS apps, end-to-end
description: Modaal is an end-to-end AI agent for native iOS in Swift. It turns your idea into the artifacts serious apps require: PRD, MVP scope, user/data flows, navigation, and growth-ready architecture‚Äîthen drives implementation as vertical slices so you ship safely, step by step. Modaal prioritizes maintainability: consistent structure across screens, clean module boundaries, and small SwiftUI diffs you can review. Connect the repo, and keep building with your team as the product scales.

name: SessionCast
tagline: CLI control to monitor and work with Claude Code remotely
description: SessionCast lets you remotely access Claude Code running on your local machine from any device. Working with Claude Code on your home PC but need to step out? Traditional remote access requires VPN setup, SSH configuration, tmux, port forwarding... and after all that, non-ASCII characters still break. Run our lightweight agent on your PC, then access your Claude Code session from any web browser ‚Äî phone, tablet, or another computer. No VPN. No SSH keys. No complex setup. Just works.

name: AI Bulk Analysis
tagline: Turn contracts into instant, actionable intelligence
description: Tool analyzes your entire contract repository - extracting structured data like dates, values, jurisdictions, milestones, renewals. you get: A complete portfolio-level snapshot (active, expired, expiring soon) Structured views across parties, values, timelines, and regions Visual dashboards for renewals, payments, and milestones Customizable parameters based on what matters to your business The ability to chat with your entire contract repository using natural language.

name: GitScrum Studio for IDE
tagline: Full project management inside VS Code, Cursor & Windsurf
description: GitScrum Studio isn't just another task list extension. It's the entire project management platform embedded inside your IDE. Stop alt-tabbing to browser. Manage Kanban boards, sprints, chat with your team, track time, access files, discussions & wiki - all without leaving VS Code, Cursor, or Windsurf. Zero browser tabs. Zero context switching. Maximum focus. Built with Laravel backend, optimized for real-time performance.

name: WebTerm
tagline: Safely run even rm -rf / ‚Äî all in your browser.
description: WebTerm now lets you safely run even the most dangerous Linux commands like `rm -rf /`, right in your browser ‚Äî no setup needed. I‚Äôve added wildcard (glob) support, expanded command and option coverage, and made interactions clearer for beginners. Unlike other terminal emulators or learning tools, WebTerm offers a realistic CLI experience instantly, without risk! It‚Äôs the most frictionless way to explore and learn the command line.
